reviewText: I was so excited because I would be not only getting a movie that I loved (sophie & the moonhanger) but also the extra one's. The movies are of very poor quality. All four movies are all on one disk & on one side (not double side).  I did not return it because it was very hard for me to locate my favorite one.
I LOVED ALL 4

I bought this collection for Sophie and the MoonHanger, but was surprised to discover that I enjoyed every movie in this collection. And how can you beat the price? This is a bargain, and the movies are moving. My favorite was Sophie.

My family and I have added this one to our DVD collection. It gives insight into some of the challenges our slave ancestors endured. This one has a really happy ending because ultimately two of the main characters realized freedom. I would recommend to everyone.

Excellent independent movies. There's no pc, sexual innuendos to be dealt with here. I think you will like the stories told here in this special set of movies. Good package for the price. I bought this set at another retailer, so do some research and looking to find a good deal near you if Amazon is too much. ~

I bought this for my mother as a Christmas present, so I can not personally say anything about these movies -- I haven't watched them! However, my mom called me and can't stop saying good things about this DVD. She loved the fact that there is more than one movie on the disc, and she also hadn't seen half of the movies. She said both she and my dad really enjoyed the movies she hadn't seen. This DVD was recommended to me because I bought the Book of Negroes, which was part of her wish list. Kudos to Amazon for knowing what she would like based on that purchase alone! You gave me good daughter points, lol. :)

Race to Freedom is a good movie for my social studies classes when studying slavery and the Fugitive Slave Act of 1850.  I don't like that it doesn't have subtitles-- some of the movie is really hard to understand and the background noise drowns out the actors voices.  NightJohn is an awesome slave story that my classes enjoy every year.  GREAT PRICE.
As an instructor Race to Freedom and Nightjohn are great ways to demonstrate slavery and the Underground Railroad to my students

Excellent value! 4 quality movies for less than 7.00.  Clean movies with moral precepts are now rare.  This set is a keeper!

Yes, there are four films on one disk, and they are no-frills, and probably not of the highest resolution for your enormous TV.  I bought this for "Honeydripper," a film I loved, and found the other three on the disk to be excellent as well.  "Sophie and the Moonhanger" might be the best of the four.  I have an old 25" CRT TV so they looked fine on my set.  There are no subtitles or extra features, but again, not a big deal for me.
